content.rendered:
OLITE PAIRABEL WIRELESS STEREO SPEAKER

  • Product Feature:
  • Dimensions: ⦶60mm x 44.6mm
  • Net Weight: 175g
  • Loudspeaker Output: 5 Watt
  • Frequency Response: 20Hz-20KHz
  • Battery Capacity: 600mAh
  • Battery Charging Voltage: 5V [USB]
  • Playback Time: Up to 4 hours
  • Battery Charge Time: 3 hours
  • Bluetooth Compliant: V5.0
  • Structure: Metal
  • Color: Black , Rose Gold , Blue , Antique Bronze , Deep Ash & Yellow
  • Warranty: 1 Year

excerpt.rendered:
• True Wireless Stereo (TWS).
  • Camera Remote Shutter.
  • Super Bass.
  • Supports Conference Call.
  • Vibrating Diaphragm.
